Package stars

Class Index_details

java.lang.Object
stars.Index_details
All Implemented Interfaces:
FlatFileObject
public class Index_details
extends java.lang.Object
implements FlatFileObject
A class that represents a course index that a student can register for during add/drop period.
Since:
10/11/2020
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Lai MingHui, Low Wei Xian

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private int capacity
    The maximum number of students that can be registered in this index
    private java.util.Set<IndexClass> classes
    A list containing the different classes (lectures, lab, tutorials) of this index.
    private java.lang.String courseCode
    The code of the course this index is under.
    private java.lang.String indexCode
    The index code of the this index
    private static int NumFields
    Number of fields in this class that should be read/written to flat file
    private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> registered
    A list containing the Matriculation number of students registered in this index.
    private java.util.Set<java.lang.String> waitlist
    A list containing the Matriculation number of students waiting in this index.

    • registerStudent

      public boolean registerStudent​(java.lang.String matricNum)
      Adds the specified matriculation number to the index. This method will return false and not modify the state of this index if the index can no longer fit any more students.
      Parameters:
      matricNum - The matriculation number of the student to register
      Returns:
      True if the matric number is succesfully added, false otherwise.

    • registerStudent

      public boolean registerStudent​(Student_details student)
      Adds the specified student to this index. This method will return false and notmodify the state of this index if the index can no longer fit any more students.
      Parameters:
      student - A Student_detail object associated with the specified student.
      Returns:
      True if the student is successfully added, false otherwise.

      Returns:
